topics.body:
_Jurassic World_ will have a hybrid dinosaur in it, so if there is a park building game that comes out with it, it might (and should) have a gameplay feature where you can cross the DNA of multiple dinosaur species together.

I mean, who doesn't want a park full of _T. rex_/raptor hybrids that you can set loose?

topics.body: Headcanon: Futa ponies exist in Equestria. They are genetically female or male due to their chromosomes, but have genitalia of the opposite sex. They occur in one out of two thousand births.
